metadata.description:
Glory Road...
Track 17 
Something New

January 2022, i ended a 2 & 1/2 year relationship with a woman i adore and love.

January 2022, i also came up with the idea to make a playlist album. 

The idea was to create a playlist album consisting of singles that are released bi-weekly, with music videos, over the course of one full year. Then, at the end of the year period consolidate them in one place for fans to enjoy. I named the project GLORY ROAD. 

"Glory Road" meant the road i needed to take to get towards artistic freedom. On this road i would have to complete 24 singles, shoot and perform in 24 music videos, consistently promote these bi-weekly releases all over the internet, and let my fans in on a side of me i have yet to share. To me, It's the road to becoming the ultimate artist. It's artist development. I learn more and more about who i am as an artist daily. I have to show up every single day, no matter what. This process is the dream.

In February 2022, i signed a 3-chapter 24 song "Glory Road" deal with Guin Records giving me the ability to execute the playlist album. In March we dropped the first song but by September 2022 we decided to discontinue our partnership for the final chapter.

Something New is the 2nd song from Chapter 03 of the playlist album Glory Road. I am happy to share with Web3 first. 

An ode to my 2 1/2 year relationship.

i don’t want to get you involved
hit decline on me all night long
I’m make believing 
can’t come up with reasons
I’m stuck thinking what you did wrong

i'm a star no make believe

i know it, headed for Fillmore
Denzel, getting Washingtons
this money stacking up heavenly 
always i look up to god
my life now was a fantasy
women popping they panties now with urgency
I’m not used this life girl 
hope you know it’s me

me now is not me then 
i know deep down you still trust me
even when we feel lusty
i feel all of that pain you hold deep down
all that pain is on me now
and our love i still see now
fuck the talk about senile 
what the fuck we gone be now 
missed calls got you feeling lost
you like what the fuck is up G how
g wow

i don’t want to get you involved
hit decline on me all night long
I’m make believing 
can’t come up with reasons
I’m stuck thinking what you did wrong

it’s like I’m stuck woah
i can’t get enough woah
what the fuck i got to do 
sometimes its not enough no

busy on my job you know
busy writing these raps
when i lock in girl 
there’s no more time for that 
ain’t no getting that time back nah
tryna build my own shit
niggas that i'm always gone pull up with
all on they own shit 
in my head girl i think too much 
ain’t no where to turn 
page 2
know you act just like yo mama
and i hope you always my boo 

And it’s hard to care bout someone more than all my problems these days
Past few years somehow i let in dramas trauma someway 
now we just tryna stay healthy
me I’m just tryna stay true
and not let none of these inner demons
fuck this up 
something new nah
